options.content:
## **Validator Monitoring by ITRocket**
в­ђ Learn more about our services: [https://itrocket.net/services/testnet/story](https://itrocket.net/services/testnet/story)

![description](https://server-5.itrocket.net/logo/story_dashboard.png)

panels.description: The amount of data contained in the last block (in bytes)
panels.title: Block Size

panels.description: Counts the transactions in the latest block.
panels.title: Transactions

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (15 min average)
panels.title: Sys Load (15m avg)

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$server_health_instance", mode="user"}[1m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$server_health_instance"}[1m])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$server_health_instance", mode="iowait"}[1m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$server_health_instance"}[1m])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$server_health_instance", mode=~".*irq"}[1m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$server_health_instance"}[1m])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$server_health_instance", mode!='idle',mode!='user',mode!='system',mode!='iowait',mode!='irq',mode!='softirq'}[1m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$server_health_instance"}[1m])))
sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$server_health_instance", mode="idle"}[1m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total[1m])))
